detailed_profile.about: I joined Strides in June 1998 and grew from Deputy Manager position to Assistant Vice President in 2008. Had diverse roles ranging from overseeing Plant Operational Finance, Structuring of entities, Integrating acquired entities, setting up new systems, building internal controls, MIS with analysis, SAP implementation, Corporate accounts, Taxation, M&A, consolidation of 40 entities globally, managing the holding entities located in UK and Cyprus, Moved to Brazil in March 2010 as part of acquisition of entity, set up systems, structuring the operations, starting the commercial entity, in depth understanding of Pharma market in Brazil. In 2013 did a successful DD on acquisition of the injectable entity by Mylan. Continued with Mylan upto March 2021. Expert knowledge on Brazil taxation, how to setup business, knowledge of local language

detailed_profile.name: Anil Kumar
detailed_profile.about: I joined Strides in June 1998 and grew from Deputy Manager position to Assistant Vice President in 2008. Had diverse roles ranging from overseeing Plant Operational Finance, Structuring of entities, Integrating acquired entities, setting up new systems, building internal controls, MIS with analysis, SAP implementation, Corporate accounts, Taxation, M&A, consolidation of 40 entities globally, managing the holding entities located in UK and Cyprus, Moved to Brazil in March 2010 as part of acquisition of entity, set up systems, structuring the operations, starting the commercial entity, in depth understanding of Pharma market in Brazil. In 2013 did a successful DD on acquisition of the injectable entity by Mylan. Continued with Mylan upto March 2021. Expert knowledge on Brazil taxation, how to setup business, knowledge of local language

detailed_profile.name: Anil Kumar
detailed_profile.about: I joined Strides in June 1998 and grew from Deputy Manager position to Assistant Vice President in 2008. Had diverse roles ranging from overseeing Plant Operational Finance, Structuring of entities, Integrating acquired entities, setting up new systems, building internal controls, MIS with analysis, SAP implementation, Corporate accounts, Taxation, M&A, consolidation of 40 entities globally, managing the holding entities located in UK and Cyprus, Moved to Brazil in March 2010 as part of acquisition of entity, set up systems, structuring the operations, starting the commercial entity, in depth understanding of Pharma market in Brazil. In 2013 did a successful DD on acquisition of the injectable entity by Mylan. Continued with Mylan upto March 2021. Expert knowledge on Brazil taxation, how to setup business, knowledge of local language

Masters in taxation and preparing for CFA level III.
